scripts.deploy:app: npm run docker:build:app && npm run docker:tag:app && npm run docker:push:app && aws ecs update-service --cluster vehicle-cluster --service vehicle-service --force-new-deployment --region us-east-2
scripts.docker:build:emer-que: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -f Dockerfile.emergencyQueueWorker -t vehicle-queue-worker:emergency .
scripts.deploy:emer-que: npm run docker:build:emer-que && npm run docker:tag:emer-que && npm run docker:push:emer-que && aws ecs update-service --cluster vehicle-cluster --service queue-worker-service --force-new-deployment --region us-east-2
scripts.docker:build:pos-que: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -f Dockerfile.positionQueueWorker -t vehicle-queue-worker:position .
scripts.deploy:pos-que: npm run docker:build:pos-que && npm run docker:tag:pos-que && npm run docker:push:pos-que && aws ecs update-service --cluster vehicle-cluster --service queue-worker-position-service --force-new-deployment --region us-east-2
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:app && npm run deploy:emer-que && npm run deploy:pos-que
